scenario_text.value:
Oh, hey Takuma. How’s your search going? Find
any clues?
No, I haven’t had any luck yet.
Yeah, I haven’t found anything either.
*sigh* If only I’d stopped her...
What do you mean?

None of this would’ve happened if I hadn’t
let Aoi go chasing after Haru on her own.

Well, it’s no use blaming yourself now.
What’s done is done.
I know that, okay? It’s just...

I was right there with her. I knew how upset
she was.

But I put my own thoughts first and wound up
driving her away.

If only I’d listened to her... If only
I hadn’t left her alone... It’s all my fault!

(Sounds like Kaito actually feels more
responsible for this than anyone.)

(But I’m sure he already knows bringing this
up won’t get us anywhere.)

(Honestly, I don’t think Aoi would be happy
to see Kaito beating himself up about this.)

(And I’m worried that Kaito might lose it,
like when he was desperate to save Miu.)

(I want to try to make him feel better, but
what can I say?)
(How can I encourage Kaito?)
What would Aoi think?
This gets us nowhere.
What would Aoi think?

Look, Kaito, I know how you must be feeling.
I’m sure I’d blame myself in your shoes too.

But what would Aoi think if she found out you
were torturing yourself because of her?
I don’t think she’d want that at all!
Well...

No, really, you’re right. Actually, I said
something similar to Aoi myself.

Haha, I guess it serves me right. Talking
down to Aoi like that...

Hey, don’t beat yourself up too much. It’s
always easier to give advice than to take it.
This gets us nowhere.

I said this to Renamon, but we’ll never get
anywhere if we focus on who’s to blame.

Once we start pointing fingers, there’ll be
no end to it.
I mean, I know that. You’re right, but...

No, whining like that’s not gonna do any
good.

Anyway, the important thing is we find Aoi,
right? Everything else comes after that.

Yeah, good point. We can’t afford to be
wasting time standing around here!

Takuma, I’m going to keep looking around with
Dracmon.
Got it. Just don’t go too far, okay?

And Kaito, you can go a little overboard
sometimes. Try not to push yourself—

Haha, what’s that? Your Aoi impression? It
sucks.

Ahaha, yeah, that did sound like something
Aoi would say.

You think so? I just said it because I was
worried.

Sure, I get it. And I won’t do anything
that’d make you guys worry about me.
Now come on, let’s go!

Hey, man, relax. I won’t do anything that’d
make you guys worry about me.

I’ll just keep looking for Aoi a little
longer.
